DOC.brief_summary: The study prospective case control clinical trial . The purpose study investigate effect elbow arthroscopy treatment osteoarthritis elbow compare conservative treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Results Treatment Patients With Elbow Osteoarthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit department hand surgery orthopedic surgery outpatient clinic . The control group patient conservative treatment continue . Patients meet inclusion criterion ask participate sign inform consent . Therefore investigator two treatment group : group 1 receives elbow joint debridement arthroscopically without physiotherapy group 2 receive conservative treatment physiotherapy .
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic posttraumatic primary osteoarthritis mechanical lock and/or decrease range motion ( > 30Â° ) Radiographic evidence least mild primary posttraumatic osteoarthritis accord Broberg Morrey classification symptom last least 6 month Patients willingness participate study All patient 1880 age Patients previous severe soft tissue trauma elbow region ( crush , burn etc elbow joint problem joint specific ) Patients crystal arthropathy inflammatory arthritis Patient refuse participate study Patients dementia institutionalized Patients severe substance addiction Patient understand write spoken guidance
